title: Best of The Program | 10/19/20
description:
Stu breaks down his Electoral College chalkboard’s disturbing prediction for Trump supporters. Jason Buttrill joins with the latest on Hunter Biden’s hard drive and email scandal and argues it’s really all about Joe Biden’s corruption. More bombshells may be dropped soon as Hunter’s business partners grow angry that he’s avoiding the punishment they’re receiving. The director of national intelligence refuted Rep. Adam Schiff’s angle that the story is Russian propaganda. Does it pay to be honest any more? Ilhan Omar has paid a lot of money to her new husband recently, and rapper Ice Cube was bashed by the Left for helping the Trump administration.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
